name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arlo App for PC Background Changer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arlo App for PC - Customize Your Background & Transform Your Chrome Experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Arlo app is like a cool tool for your Chrome browser that lets you change the background color in Chrome to black or white, really easily.

It works on both Windows and Mac and pc. You can make these changes not just on Google Search, but on any website you visit, like Facebook or your mail box, look different. With just one click, you can make the internet look the way you want.

So why late, just visit websites, making everything feel more you.
